name: In Love With A Girl (The Village Sessions)
content: Take the pain of protecting your name
Fell for the woman just when I met her
Took my sweet time when I was bitter
Someone understands
Give me that feeling every night
Wants to make love when I wanna fight
Now someone understand me
After many broken backdoors and windows
From the thrones without any innuendos
But you drown in a piece for the moment
The moment was over in time
Fell for the woman just when I met her
Took my sweet time when I was bitter
Someone understands
Give me that feeling every night
Wants to make love when I wanna fight
Now someone understand me
To be held in shelter
Fell for the woman just when I met her
Took my sweet time when I was bitter
Someone understands
Give me that feeling every night
Wants to make love when I wanna fight
Now someone understands me
Who knows me better
Wants to make love when I wanna fight
Now someone understand me
